name: Snowman Torso: Egg Fortress Classic
description: A traditionally-styled snowman torso that can be used to build a Puffy Snowman.\nThis torso design is very simple, and even children with very little strength can make it with ease. No one knows which glutton it was who said that this snowman was like an Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich, but the nickname spread far and wide regardless. Some adventurers will even build this sort of snowman when out in cold regions to provide what some term "visual fullness."
